TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sesiraya, title = sesiraya, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sesiraya} }

S.FORM: kinaizuanan nua sesiraya a caucau mavan a i kazatjan a pasanavalj a kaledep a kacedas tua tayuan. sipapukeljang itjen tau sa kadjunangan avan a i tailam katua i taitu tucu. izuanan matjasepatj a taqaljaqaljan tucu a tja mapacunan: izua mattauw, soelangh, baccloangh, katua sinckan. aicu a sepatj a qinaljan mavan a i tucu a pinaljavakan a muadaw, kali, sianhwa, sinci.

kinaizoanan noa sesiraya a caocao mavan a i kazatjan a pasanavalj a kaledep a kacedas toa tayoan. sipapokeljang itjen tao sa kadjonangan avan a i tailam katoa i taito toco. izoanan matjasepatj a taqaljaqaljan toco a tja mapaconan: izoa mattaow, soelangh, baccloangh, katoa sinckan. aico a sepatj a qinaljan mavan a i toco a pinaljavakan a moadaw, kali, sianhwa, sinci.
